statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND ingredient_name = 'Flour';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE ingredient_id = 5 OR (quantity > 20 AND reorder_threshold < 5);
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE order_quantity < 10 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Ingredients WHERE current_stock <= reorder_threshold AND ingredient_id = 'f21cbb68-62d4-4607-9a0b-1153b6e992bc';
DELETE FROM recipes WHERE name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_quantity >= 100 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
